message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's fair to propose a price of $11,500 for this exceptional item. This offer is valid for the next round, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $11,500 is still a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm prepared to offer $10,500 for the product. This is my best offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your interest in it, I am willing to accept $11,000 for the product. This is my final offer for this round. I hope we can reach an agreement that suits both of us.
